lastSession.summary: Fixed multi-select requirement in interactive menu - v3.9.2
completedTasks: Made multiSelect: true requirement more explicit in do.md Phase 0
Added CRITICAL marker and DO NOT use multiSelect: false warning
nextSteps: Test interactive menu with multi-select in other repos

recentChanges: v3.9.2: Fix multi-select in interactive menu - explicit CRITICAL requirement
